abstract: The monk whose journey spawned millions of Spandex-clad yoga devotees.
snippet: The monk whose journey spawned millions of Spandex-clad yoga devotees.
lead_paragraph: "Not too long ago, Vivekananda, a household name in his homeland, was famous here as well, as the first missionary from the East to the West," writes Ann Louise Bardach in the Sunday Review of The New York Times.
